languages.text: Благодаря зачитанным корабельным исповедником по {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системе отрывкам из "Уложения о наказаниях" аварийные работы были значительно ускорены, а критически важные узлы судна спасены.

traits.locale_text: Благодаря зачитанным Корабельным исповедником по вокс-системе отрывкам из "Уложения о наказаниях" аварийные работы были значительно ускорены, а критически важные узлы судна спасены.

languages.text: Thanks to the ship's confessor reading extracts from the Code of Punishment over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, the emergency repairs were completed much sooner, and the ship's critical nodes saved.
languages.original_text: Благодаря зачитанным корабельным исповедником по {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системе отрывкам из "Уложения о наказаниях" аварийные работы были значительно ускорены, а критически важные узлы судна спасены.

traits.locale_text: Thanks to the ship's confessor reading extracts from the Code of Punishment over the vox-system, the emergency repairs were completed much sooner, and the ship's critical nodes saved.

Thanks to the ship's confessor reading extracts from the Code of Punishment over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, the emergency repairs were completed much sooner, and the ship's critical nodes saved.

languages.text: Gracias al confesor de la nave, que leyó extractos del Código de Castigo por el sistema de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}, las reparaciones de emergencia terminaron antes de lo previsto, salvando varios nodos críticos de la nave.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the ship's confessor reading extracts from the Code of Punishment over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, the emergency repairs were completed much sooner, and the ship's critical nodes saved.

traits.locale_text: Gracias al confesor de la nave, que leyó extractos del Código de Castigo por el sistema de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}, las reparaciones de emergencia terminaron antes de lo previsto, salvando varios nodos críticos de la nave.

languages.text: 幸亏舰上的告解者通过{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统宣读了《惩戒法典》的摘要内容，紧急维修才得以加速完成，虚空舰的重要区域也免于毁灭。
languages.original_text: Thanks to the ship's confessor reading extracts from the Code of Punishment over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, the emergency repairs were completed much sooner, and the ship's critical nodes saved.

traits.locale_text: 幸亏舰上的司祭通过{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统宣读了《惩戒法典》的摘要内容，紧急维修才得以加速完成，虚空舰的重要区域也免于毁灭。

languages.text: 船の聴罪師が{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}システムを通じて罰の掟の抜粋を読んだおかげで、緊急修理ははるかに早く完了し、船の重要なノードが助かった。
languages.original_text: Thanks to the ship's confessor reading extracts from the Code of Punishment over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, the emergency repairs were completed much sooner, and the ship's critical nodes saved.

traits.locale_text: 船の聴罪師が{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}システムを通じて罰の掟の抜粋を読んだおかげで、緊急修理ははるかに早く完了し、船の重要なノードが助かった。

languages.text: Dank des Beichtvaters des Schiffes, der über das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-System Auszüge aus dem Strafgesetzbuch vorlas, konnten die Notreparaturen viel schneller abgeschlossen und die kritischen Knoten des Schiffes gerettet werden.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the ship's confessor reading extracts from the Code of Punishment over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, the emergency repairs were completed much sooner, and the ship's critical nodes saved.

traits.locale_text: Thanks to the ship's confessor reading extracts from the Code of Punishment over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, the emergency repairs were completed much sooner, and the ship's critical nodes saved.

languages.text: Grâce au confesseur du vaisseau qui lisait des extraits du Code des Châtiments sur le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}système-vox{/g}, les réparations d'urgence ont été effectuées en un temps record, et les organes vitaux du vaisseau ont pu être sauvés.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the ship's confessor reading extracts from the Code of Punishment over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, the emergency repairs were completed much sooner, and the ship's critical nodes saved.

traits.locale_text: Grâce au confesseur du vaisseau qui lisait des extraits du Code des Châtiments sur le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}système-vox{/g}, les réparations d'urgence ont été effectuées en un temps record, et les organes vitaux du vaisseau ont pu être sauvés.

languages.text: Geminin günah çıkarıcısının {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sisteminde Ceza Kanunları'ndan alıntılar okuması sayesinde acil durum onarımları çok daha hızlı tamamlandı ve geminin kritik önem taşıyan bölümleri kurtarıldı.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the ship's confessor reading extracts from the Code of Punishment over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, the emergency repairs were completed much sooner, and the ship's critical nodes saved.
